response.job_title: Manager Trade /MBA candidate/ Franchise Channel / Retail/ / FMCG/ Sales/ Trade marketing/ Omnichannel/ Pharma
response.summary: Industrial Engineer with experience in channel management, account management and trade marketing. B2B and B2C experience in retail, franchise and consumer goods companies. Creative, proactive and innovative attitude with a practical focus in objectives accomplishment. Excellent communication skills and ability to analyze qualitative and quantitative data. High aptitude and experience in team working and leadership, while building value relationships with teams and clients.
response.skills: Consultas técnicas, Campañas, Campañas de marketing, Gestión operativa, Activations, Gestión de partes interesadas, Presentaciones, Compromiso de los clientes, Definición de procesos, Research, Project Management, Corporate Social Responsibility, Energy Industry, Energy Regulation, Business Development, Marketing Strategy, Environmental Science, Market Research, Customer Insight, Customer Service

profile_positions.description:
Leading trade marketing strategy for abbott channel management.

1. Leading and executing omnichannel marketing strategy for trade
2. GTN, revenue and financial analysis of commercial & trade marketing plans
3. Shopper and Catman strategy development and execution
4. POS flawless execution and third party management
5. Collaborative commercial relationships with key accounts
profile_positions.title: Trade Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
· Develop and expand Franchise Channel for Colombia.
· Growth Strategy, Roll Out Plan and casting of partners.
· P&L Review: Franchise Channel and Partners.
· Sell In and Sell Out Forecast 
· Partnership business advisor to elevate shopper experience in franchise stores
profile_positions.title: Senior Manager Franchise Channel

profile_positions.description:
*Lead channels strategy according to retail environment and shopper preferences understanding.
*Promotional plans and budget accordingly to KPIs in sell out, ROI, NS and demand elasticity.
*Shopper platforms development according to customer specifics category growth drivers.
*Building blocks :shopper experience, promotional plans, new RE and perfect store execution strategy.
*KPIs: Net sales, Market share, sell out, profit, category DH, Nielsen, FMCG
profile_positions.title: Channel Manager Modern Trade Customer Marketing

profile_positions.description:
*Managing national accounts in modern Trade Carulla, Grupo Exito banners and discounters.
*Leading sales growth strategies to improve KPIs and brand performance in clients and shoppers. 
*Building strong commercial relationships with key decision makers and teams inside clients.
*Creating and negotiating business development opportunities driven by JBPs and growth building blocks.
*Negotiating visibility, product portfolio opportunities (new products) and activations to improve POS.
*Leading national and local execution teams in order to continuously improve trade marketing execution and brand POS experience.
profile_positions.title: Key account manager Modern Trade

profile_positions.description:
Developing and executing growth plans in independent supermarkets and wholesale distributors channels for Cundinamarca, guaranteeing the development and implementation of strategies for the growth and value proposition in clients, salesforce and customers.
* Key Accounts JBPs development and execution in indirect channel FMCG
* Focus on sell out and numerical distribution strategies and execution roadmap.
*Leading direct and secondary sales teams, in order to achieve sell out and numerical distribution goals.
*Guarantee perfect store execution and activations to consumer in POS for traditional stores channel.
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive Indirect Channel

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for managing sales plans in traditional stores channel for Cundinamarca - TAT, guaranteeing the development and implementation of strategies for the growth and strengthening of our clients.
* Focus on Rotation, increase of numerical distribution and market share, implementing aggressive strategies, working against significant competitors.
* Leading direct and secondary sales teams, in order to achieve sell out and numerical distribution goals.
*Leading marketing execution team in order to guarantee perfect store execution and activations to consumer in POS, according to complexity of traditional stores channel.
* Support the operation of national accounts in traditional stores channel: Altipal.
profile_positions.title: Sales Executive Traditional Channel - TAT Cundinamarca

profile_positions.description:

ACHIEVED GOALS: Lead,plan and develop visibility and branding projects of POP, promotional activities to consumer, sales force and clients loyalty and incentives plans, contributing to client and customer loyalty and delight.

Make things happen !
profile_positions.title: Promotion coordinator- Trade Marketing Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Belcorp is one of the leaders in cosmetics in Lationoamerica, commited with the beauty and personal development of latin american women.

profile_positions.title: Marketing Intern

company.name: Abbott
company.description:
Abbott is a global healthcare leader that helps people live more fully at all stages of life. Our portfolio of life-changing technologies spans the spectrum of healthcare, with leading businesses and products in diagnostics, medical devices, nutritional and branded generic medicines. Our 115,000 colleagues serve people in more than 160 countries.
 
Connect with us at www.abbott.com, on Facebook at www.facebook.com/Abbott and www.facebook.com/AbbottCareers, on Instagram @AbbottGlobal, and on Twitter @AbbottNews.

We invite you to explore opportunities at Abbott, to see if your talents and career aspirations may fit with our openings. An equal opportunity employer, Abbott welcomes and encourages diversity in our workforce.
